1: -module(carboncopy_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -compile([export_all]).
    4: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    5: -include_lib("proper/include/proper.hrl").
    6: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
    7: 
    8: -define(ae(Expected, Actual), ?assertEqual(Expected, Actual)).
    9: 
   10: all() -> [{group, all}].
   11: 
   12: 
   13: groups() ->
   14:     [{all, [parallel,shuffle],
   15:       [discovering_support,
   16:        enabling_carbons,
   17:        disabling_carbons,
   18:        avoiding_carbons,
   19:        non_enabled_clients_dont_get_sent_carbons,
   20:        non_enabled_clients_dont_get_received_carbons,
   21:        enabled_single_resource_doesnt_get_carbons,
   22:        dropped_client_doesnt_create_duplicate_carbons,
   23:        prop_forward_received_chat_messages,
   24:        prop_forward_sent_chat_messages,
   25:        prop_normal_routing_to_bare_jid
   26:       ]}].
   27: 
   28: init_per_suite(C) -> escalus:init_per_suite(C).
   29: end_per_suite(C) -> escalus_fresh:clean(), escalus:end_per_suite(C).
   30: init_per_testcase(Name,C) -> escalus:init_per_testcase(Name,C).
   31: end_per_testcase(Name,C) -> escalus:end_per_testcase(Name,C).
   32: run_prop(PropName, Property) ->
   33:     ?ae(true, proper:quickcheck(proper:conjunction([{PropName, Property}]),
   34:                                 [verbose,long_result, {numtests, 3}])).
   35: 
   36: discovering_support(Config) ->
   37:     escalus:fresh_story(
   38:       Config, [{alice, 1}],
   39:       fun(Alice) ->
   40:               IqGet = escalus_stanza:disco_info(<<"localhost">>),
   41:               escalus_client:send(Alice, IqGet),
   42:               Result = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
   43:               escalus:assert(is_iq_result, [IqGet], Result),
   44:               escalus:assert(has_feature, [<<"urn:xmpp:carbons:2">>], Result)
   45:       end).
   46: 
   47: enabling_carbons(Config) ->
   48:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun carbons_get_enabled/1).
   49: 
   50: disabling_carbons(Config) ->
   51:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{alice, 1}],
   52:                   fun(Alice) -> carbons_get_enabled(Alice),
   53:                                 carbons_get_disabled(Alice) end).
   54: 
   55: avoiding_carbons(Config) ->
   56:     escalus:fresh_story(
   57:       Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}],
   58:       fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
   59:               carbons_get_enabled([Alice1,Alice2]),
   60:               Msg = escalus_stanza:chat_without_carbon_to(Bob,
   61:                                                           <<"And pious action">>),
   62:               escalus_client:send(Alice1, Msg),
   63:               escalus:assert(
   64:                 is_chat_message, [<<"And pious action">>],
   65:                 escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
   66:               escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 1),
   67:               [] = escalus_client:peek_stanzas(Alice2)
   68:       end).
   69: 
   70: non_enabled_clients_dont_get_sent_carbons(Config) ->
   71:     escalus:fresh_story(
   72:       Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}],
   73:       fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
   74:               Msg = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"And pious action">>),
   75:               escalus_client:send(Alice1, Msg),
   76:               escalus:assert(
   77:                 is_chat_message, [<<"And pious action">>],
   78:                 escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
   79:               escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 1),
   80:               [] = escalus_client:peek_stanzas(Alice2)
   81:       end).
   82: 
   83: non_enabled_clients_dont_get_received_carbons(Config) ->
   84:     escalus:fresh_story(
   85:       Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}],
   86:       fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
   87:               Msg = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice1, <<"And pious action">>),
   88:               escalus_client:send(Bob, Msg),
   89:               escalus:assert(
   90:                 is_chat_message, [<<"And pious action">>],
   91:                 escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice1)),
   92:               escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 1),
   93:               [] = escalus_client:peek_stanzas(Alice2)
   94:       end).
   95: 
   96: 
   97: enabled_single_resource_doesnt_get_carbons(Config) ->
   98:     BobsMessages = [
   99:                     <<"There's such a thing as dwelling">>,
  100:                     <<"On the thought ourselves have nursed,">>,
  101:                     <<"And with scorn and courage telling">>,
  102:                     <<"The world to do its worst.">>
  103:                    ],
  104:     escalus:fresh_story(
  105:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  106:       fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  107:               carbons_get_enabled(Alice),
  108:               [ escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, M))
  109:                 || M <- BobsMessages ],
  110:               [ escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [M], escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  111:                 || M <- BobsMessages ]
  112:       end).
  113: 
  114: dropped_client_doesnt_create_duplicate_carbons(Config) ->
  115:     escalus:fresh_story(
  116:       Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}],
  117:       fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
  118:               Msg = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"And pious action">>),
  119:               given_client_logs_out(Alice2),
  120:               _Pres = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice1),
  121: 
  122:               escalus_client:send(Alice1, Msg),
  123:               escalus:assert(
  124:                 is_chat_message, [<<"And pious action">>],
  125:                 escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
  126:               [] = escalus_client:peek_stanzas(Alice1)
  127:       end).
  128: 
  129: prop_forward_received_chat_messages(Config) ->
  130:     run_prop
  131:       (forward_received,
  132:        ?FORALL({N,Msg}, {no_of_resources(), utterance()},
  133:                true_story
  134:                  (Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, N}],
  135:                   fun(Users) ->
  136:                           all_bobs_other_resources_get_received_carbons(Users,Msg)
  137:                   end))).
  138: 
  139: prop_forward_sent_chat_messages(Config) ->
  140:     run_prop
  141:         (forward_sent,
  142:          ?FORALL({N,Msg}, {no_of_resources(),utterance()},
  143:                  true_story
  144:                    (Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, N}],
  145:                     fun(Users) ->
  146:                             all_bobs_other_resources_get_sent_carbons(Users,Msg)
  147:                     end))).
  148: 
  149: prop_normal_routing_to_bare_jid(Config) ->
  150:     run_prop
  151:         (normal_routing,
  152:          ?FORALL({N,Msg}, {no_of_resources(),utterance()},
  153:                  true_story
  154:                    (Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, N}],
  155:                     fun(Users) ->
  156:                             all_bobs_resources_get_message_to_bare_jid(Users,Msg)
  157:                     end))).
  158: 
  159: 
  160: 
  161: %%
  162: %% Test scenarios w/assertions
  163: %%
  164: 
  165: all_bobs_resources_get_message_to_bare_jid([Alice,Bob1|Bobs], Msg) ->
  166:     %% All connected resources receive messages sent
  167:     %% to the user's bare JID without carbon wrappers.
  168:     carbons_get_enabled([Bob1|Bobs]),
  169:     escalus_client:send(
  170:       Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob1), Msg)),
  171:     GotMsg = fun(BobsResource) ->
  172:                      escalus:assert(
  173:                        is_chat_message,
  174:                        [Msg],
  175:                        escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(BobsResource)),
  176:                      escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(BobsResource)
  177:              end,
  178:     lists:foreach(GotMsg, [Bob1|Bobs]).
  179: 
  180: all_bobs_other_resources_get_received_carbons([Alice,Bob1|Bobs], Msg) ->
  181:     carbons_get_enabled([Bob1|Bobs]),
  182:     escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob1, Msg)),
  183:     GotForward = fun(BobsResource) ->
  184:                          escalus:assert(
  185:                            is_forwarded_received_message,
  186:                            [escalus_client:full_jid(Alice),
  187:                             escalus_client:full_jid(Bob1),
  188:                             Msg],
  189:                            escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(BobsResource)),
  190:                          escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(BobsResource) end,
  191:     lists:foreach(GotForward, Bobs).
  192: 
  193: all_bobs_other_resources_get_sent_carbons([Alice,Bob1|Bobs], Msg) ->
  194:     carbons_get_enabled([Bob1|Bobs]),
  195:     escalus_client:send(Bob1, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, Msg)),
  196:     escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [Msg], escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  197:     GotCarbon = fun(BobsResource) ->
  198:                         escalus:assert(
  199:                           is_forwarded_sent_message,
  200:                           [escalus_client:full_jid(Bob1),
  201:                            escalus_client:full_jid(Alice),
  202:                            Msg],
  203:                           escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(BobsResource)),
  204:                         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(BobsResource) end,
  205:     lists:foreach(GotCarbon, Bobs).
  206: 
  207: carbons_get_disabled(ClientOrClients) ->
  208:     disable_carbons(ClientOrClients).
  209: 
  210: carbons_get_enabled(ClientOrClients) ->
  211:     enable_carbons(ClientOrClients).
  212: 
  213: 
  214: %%
  215: %% Internal helpers
  216: %%
  217: 
  218: given_client_logs_out(Client) ->
  219:     escalus_client:stop(Client),
  220:     timer:sleep(300).
  221: 
  222: %% Wrapper around escalus:story. Returns PropEr result.
  223: true_story(Config, UserSpecs, TestFun) ->
  224:     try   escalus:fresh_story(Config, UserSpecs, TestFun), true
  225:     catch E ->
  226:               ct:pal("~p", [E]),
  227:               {error, E}
  228:     end.
  229: 
  230: %% Number of resources per users
  231: no_of_resources() -> random:uniform(4).
  232: 
  233: %% A sample chat message
  234: utterance() ->
  235:     proper_types:oneof(
  236:       [<<"Now, fair Hippolyta, our nuptial hour">>,
  237:        <<"Draws on apace; four happy days bring in">>,
  238:        <<"Another moon: but, O, methinks, how slow">>,
  239:        <<"This old moon wanes! she lingers my desires">>,
  240:        <<"Like to a step-dame or a dowager">>,
  241:        <<"Long withering out a young man revenue.">>]).
  242: 
  243: 
  244: enable_carbons(Clients) when is_list(Clients) ->
  245:     lists:foreach(fun enable_carbons/1, Clients);
  246: enable_carbons(Client) ->
  247:     IqSet = escalus_stanza:carbons_enable(),
  248:     escalus_client:send(Client, IqSet),
  249:     Result = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Client),
  250:     escalus:assert(is_iq, [<<"result">>], Result).
  251: 
  252: 
  253: disable_carbons(Clients) when is_list(Clients) ->
  254:     lists:foreach(fun disable_carbons/1, Clients);
  255: disable_carbons(Client) ->
  256:     IqSet = escalus_stanza:carbons_disable(),
  257:     escalus_client:send(Client, IqSet),
  258:     Result = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Client),
  259:     escalus:assert(is_iq, [<<"result">>], Result).
